data.lyric:
[ti:Momma's House]
[ar:Dustin Lynch]
[al:Tullahoma]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Momma's House - Dustin Lynch
[00:15.40]I see your face on every street
[00:17.66]Every corner couple trees
[00:20.24]Even got our name on 'em
[00:23.61]I feel your love I hear your laugh
[00:25.65]Got them take-me-way-on-back
[00:27.69]Hurt-me memories I don't want 'em
[00:31.11]Up and down the boulevard
[00:35.60]In and out of every bar
[00:39.92]I'd burn this whole town down
[00:42.64]Pick a spot dig a hole put them ashes in the ground
[00:47.21]Baby I'd burn this whole town down
[00:50.87]If it wasn't for my momma's house my momma's house
[00:56.35]Damn girl why'd you have to break it like that
[00:59.91]Leaving pieces of my shattered heart scattered like glass
[01:03.96]I'd burn this whole town down
[01:06.87]If it wasn't for my momma's house my momma's house
[01:19.45]I would start it when where we started at the downtown party
[01:23.85]Where you kissed my lips and stole my beer
[01:27.48]The city park in the dark where we looked up at the stars
[01:31.70]Watched them fireworks pop last year
[01:34.69]I'd start it under that Texaco sign where you said goodbye
[01:39.55]I'd get some gas and drop a match right there
[01:43.91]I'd burn this whole town down
[01:46.73]Pick a spot dig a hole put them ashes in the ground
[01:51.33]Baby I'd burn this whole town down
[01:54.66]If it wasn't for my momma's house my momma's house
[02:00.18]D**n girl why'd you have to break it like that
[02:03.93]Leaving pieces of my shattered heart scattered like glass
[02:07.89]I'd burn this whole town down
[02:10.64]If it wasn't for my momma's house my momma's house
[02:32.15]Fire-red flames sunsets in the sky
[02:35.76]Going out staying in staying up long nights
[02:39.93]Now I'm waking up alone wishing I could move on
[02:43.86]Blocked your number in my phone thought it'd help but it don't
[02:47.62]I'd burn this whole town down
[02:50.71]Pick a spot dig a hole put them ashes in the ground
[02:55.27]Baby I'd burn this whole town down
[02:58.66]If it wasn't for my momma's house my momma's house
[03:04.22]D**n girl why'd you have to break it like that
[03:07.93]Leaving pieces of my shattered heart scattered like glass
[03:11.93]I'd burn this whole town down
[03:14.73]If it wasn't for my momma's house my momma's house
[03:27.77]Baby I'd burn this whole town down
[03:30.71]If it wasn't for my momma's house my momma's house
data.trans:
[ti:Momma's House]
[ar:Dustin Lynch]
[al:Tullahoma]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:15.40]我在每条街上都能看见你的脸庞
[00:17.66]每一个街角都有几棵树
[00:20.24]甚至上面刻着我们的名字
[00:23.61]我感受到你的爱意 我聆听着你的笑声
[00:25.65]让我回想起往日的种种
[00:27.69]我想忘记那些让我痛不欲生的记忆
[00:31.11]在林荫大道上徘徊等待
[00:35.60]辗转于每一家酒吧
[00:39.92]我要把整个城市付诸一炬
[00:42.64]选个地方 挖个坑 把灰烬埋进土里
[00:47.21]宝贝 我要把整个城市付诸一炬
[00:50.87]如果不是因为我妈妈的房子 我早就付诸行动
[00:56.35]狠心的女孩 为什么你要这样伤害我
[00:59.91]让我支离破碎的心如玻璃一般散落一地
[01:03.96]我要把整个城市付诸一炬
[01:06.87]如果不是因为我妈妈的房子 我早就付诸行动
[01:19.45]我会率先点燃我们在市中心舞会认识的地方
[01:23.85]你在那里亲吻我的嘴唇 偷走我的啤酒
[01:27.48]我们在漆黑一片的城市公园里仰望星空
[01:31.70]去年 我们看着绚烂的烟花绽放天际
[01:34.69]我会率先点燃德士古公司的招牌 你在那里与我告别
[01:39.55]我会弄到汽油 在那里点燃火柴
[01:43.91]我要把整个城市付诸一炬
[01:46.73]选个地方 挖个坑 把灰烬埋进土里
[01:51.33]宝贝 我要把整个城市付诸一炬
[01:54.66]如果不是因为我妈妈的房子 我早就付诸行动
[02:00.18]狠心的女孩 为什么你要这样伤害我
[02:03.93]让我支离破碎的心如玻璃一般散落一地
[02:07.89]我要把整个城市付诸一炬
[02:10.64]如果不是因为我妈妈的房子 我早就付诸行动
[02:32.15]如烈焰一般火红的落日挂在天边
[02:35.76]走出家门 待在家里 难以入睡 度过漫漫长夜
[02:39.93]现在我独自醒来 希望我可以释怀
[02:43.86]把你的电话号码加入黑名单 我以为这有用 可惜事与愿违
[02:47.62]我要把整个城市付诸一炬
[02:50.71]选个地方 挖个坑 把灰烬埋进土里
[02:55.27]宝贝 我要把整个城市付诸一炬
[02:58.66]如果不是因为我妈妈的房子 我早就付诸行动
[03:04.22]狠心的女孩 为什么你要这样伤害我
[03:07.93]让我支离破碎的心如玻璃一般散落一地
[03:11.93]我要把整个城市付诸一炬
[03:14.73]如果不是因为我妈妈的房子 我早就付诸行动
[03:27.77]宝贝 我要把整个城市付诸一炬
[03:30.71]如果不是因为我妈妈的房子 我早就付诸行动
